title: Interpretation of a dream about carrying twins for a married woman in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about carrying twins for a married woman in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. It is one of the dreams that is widespread among pregnant women and married women, especially since the interpretation scholars unanimously agreed that the dream of carrying twins in a dream carries with it. Good news and goodness is reflected in the life of the dreamer, but seeing a pregnancy with twins in a dream varies in its interpretation depending on the condition of the dreamer, in addition to the symbols and elements present in the dream, and it is noted that they vary between good and evil in the interpretation. Interpretation of a dream of a married woman carrying twins in a dream Ibn Sirin in general Interpretation scholars unanimously agreed that seeing a pregnancy with twins in a dream brings good and good news to the fortuneteller. The scholar Ibn Sirin interpreted the dream of a pregnancy with twins for a pregnant married woman, as it is one of the interpretations that brings goodness. Ibn Sirin explained that the interpretation of this dream is an indication that the woman who dreams She will gain a lot of sustenance and money in the coming period of her life. In case the woman who saw this dream is suffering from some difficult problems in her life, then this dream will be a good omen to alleviate those problems. Undoubtedly, the dream also indicates that she will be able to get rid of From all problems very quickly. If the dreaming woman has her own business in reality, the interpretation of the dream indicates that this business will grow and succeed, God willing. Also, when the dreamer works in a job, the interpretation of the dream indicates the high status in that job and the breadth of her livelihood. God Almighty is Most High and knows the unseen. Interpretation of tracking a pregnant woman’s twin pregnancy by Al-Nabulsi Al-Nabulsi sees that seeing a pregnant woman with twins brings good news in her life. When a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is pregnant with twins, this indicates the stability of her life in the coming days and she will rejoice with the help of God Almighty. The interpretation of this dream could also be that the dreamer will obtain a lot of sustenance, whether that sustenance is money or good children. Al-Nabulsi explained that the interpretation of this type of dream indicates that great happiness will arrive for the dreamer and she will feel satisfied in her life. Often it is a woman’s dream. A pregnant woman becomes pregnant with twins as a result of thinking a lot about this matter and feeling stressed, and God Almighty is Most High and knows the unseen. See also: Interpretation of a dream about breastfeeding in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about pregnancy with twins by Ibn Shaheen. The scholar Ibn Shaheen interpreted a group of different dreams and visions, as he interpreted a dream about being pregnant with twins in Woman, a group of interpretations and interpretations that contain good news for the dreamer and good news for her life, in addition to happiness and pleasure, she will succeed, and we present to you some of these interpretations: Ibn Shaheen believes that the interpretation of seeing pregnancy with twins in a dream generally indicates the joy and pleasure that the woman will feel. In addition, if A woman sees in a dream that her stomach is very large, this indicates that a lot of food and money has arrived to her, and the dream indicates the arrival of many things that the dreamer desires in real life. Likewise, if a woman sees this dream and does not feel happy in the dream, then

title: Interpretation of a dream about giving appointments in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a person who gave me dates. Interpretation of seeing a person who gives dates to a fortune teller in a dream indicates kindness, great living, and many benefits that can be gained. Seeing gifts of dates in a dream is one of the praiseworthy visions that indicates moving to a decent life and getting a good job. Also, seeing gifts of dates in a dream is one of the praiseworthy visions that indicates moving to a decent life and getting a good job. A father taking a date in a dream indicates inheritance and many benefits that the dreamer will receive from his family. Seeing eating dates in a dream is considered one of the desired dreams and indicates religiosity and closeness to God Almighty. Dates in a dream in general indicate days full of happiness and joy and indicate the fulfillment of desires. And the dreamer’s aspirations. Interpretation of giving a date in a dream to a single woman. Interpretation of seeing the distribution of dates in a dream for a single woman indicates that she has passed the difficult stages and overcome problems and troubles in her life. Also, seeing the gift of a date in a dream for a single woman indicates a lot of goodness and blessings and that she will enter a new life. And preferred. Seeing a date in a dream for a girl generally indicates benefit and success in her studies and obtaining what she is looking for. Obtaining a date from a dead person in a dream for a girl is one of the dreams that indicate that she will obtain a wish. Interpretation of attributing dates in a dream to a married woman. Interpretation of a dream of giving dates In a dream for a married woman, there are visions that indicate benefit and an end to the problems that she suffers from. A date in a dream for a married woman is evidence that she will move to a new life that will be better for her than what she experienced in the past. Seeing a date in a woman’s dream is a desirable dream and indicates... Piety, good morals, and closeness to God Almighty. Interpretation of a dream about giving appointments to someone in a dream. Seeing yourself dating someone you know in a dream is evidence of achieving goals, fulfilling desires, and success in projects. Also, to dream of dating someone you hate is a sign of freedom from enemies, peace, and stability in your life. Seeing a woman giving dates to her husband in a dream symbolizes that God will grant her pregnancy, easy childbirth, and fair children. Interpretation of a dream of giving dates to a dead person in a dream. Interpretation of seeing dates given to a deceased person in a dream shows mercy for him in this world, kindness, and good circumstances for the dreamer. Among the visions of goodness and well-being. Whoever dreams of a dead person giving him dates, it is also a sign of blessing. What does it mean to distribute dates in a dream? Interpretation scholars unanimously agree that seeing yourself distributing dates in a dream is one of the desired visions and indicates joys, happiness, and pleasures. Seeing yourself distributing dates to people in a dream is Evidence of success, academic success, and getting what one wants in life. Seeing yourself distributing dates in a dream means kindness and benefit, increasing blessings in this world, healing the sick, and improving conditions in general. If you have a dream that you want to interpret, put it in a comment below and it will A team of experts will respond to you as soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing hunting in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing hunting in a dream, the meaning of hunting rabbits and birds, the meaning of fishing, a dream about hunting with a gun and seeing a hunter in a dream. In fact, fishing in a dream has many different meanings and connotations that we will know according to the interpretation of great interpreters and commentators. The meaning of a dream about seeing hunting in a dream according to Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi. Hunting in a dream indicates success and success in practical life, achieving ambitions, and hunting birds indicates wisdom in matters and wisdom in adapting. Interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s vision about hunting: Seeing hunting in a dream according to Ibn Sirin, the interpretation of hunting In a dream, spoils and great benefits from enemies appear. Interpretation of a dream about catching tilapia fish by hand in a dream is a sign of success and ambition after jihad. Interpretation of a dream about catching birds in a dream is evidence that the dreamer is wise and intelligent in his judgment on matters. Interpretation of a dream about fishing in the sea indicates a good life. Broad and an increase in lawful money. The interpretation of seeing birds hunting in a dream is a sign of injustice and oppression and is considered unpleasant visions. Dreaming of seeing a skilled hunter in a dream is evidence of acumen, wisdom, insight and intelligence in dealing with others. Interpretation of the vision of hunting by Nabulsi: And the dream of hunting, as narrated The great Arab scholar, Nabulsi, indicates an abundance of goodness and abundant profits. Seeing a bird hunting in a dream may indicate bad words to distort a good woman’s biography. The interpretation of seeing hunting dogs in a dream indicates good news and good luck when they go hunting. In general, seeing dogs is considered Hunting in a dream is a sign of strength and may indicate a loyal friend. Interpretation of a dream about searching for a single woman: Seeing hunting in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. A dream about hunting rabbits and deer in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates engagement and early marriage. Interpretation of a dream about searching for an unmarried woman is evidence That she will marry a person she desires. Dreaming of seeing predatory animals fighting in one woman’s dream is evidence of her victory over her enemies. Seeing one girl hunting an animal and shedding its blood indicates hostility with someone close to her. Interpretation of seeing a girl holding a net in a dream is a sign of Her goodness, as well as good news for her. Seeing a handsome hunter in a dream for an unmarried girl means that she will marry someone suitable for her. Interpretation of a dream about searching for a married woman: The interpretation of a dream about hunting lions for a married woman is evidence of her husband’s promotion in his work and the acquisition of a lot of money. A woman’s dream A married woman hunting rabbits and deer indicates the well-being of her children and the stability of her family. Interpretation of a dream about searching for a bathroom for a married woman indicates bad news, stress and anxiety for her. Interpretation of a dream about searching for a pregnant woman: Seeing hunting in a dream for a pregnant woman is a sign that the due date is approaching and she will have a natural birth. Easy. Fishing in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates that her birth will go well and that her child will be healthy. Seeing fishing equipment in a dream. Seeing a fishing net in a dream means the return of an absent person or traveler. Seeing a fishing net in a dream with many fish indicates goodness.

title: Interpretation of seeing ablution in a dream is based on the interpretation of Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, and Ibn Shaheen

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing ablution in a dream According to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin, Nabulsi, and Ibn Shaheen, dreams are those images and successive, incompletely understood events that a person sees during sleep, especially in the deep sleep stage. It is largely related to the future, and many scholars, such as Ibn Sirin al-Nabulsi, have put explanations about it in their books, and in this article we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing washing in a dream according to the interpretation. Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, and Ibn Shaheen. Interpretation of dreams to see washing in a dream, Interpretation by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin explained that whoever sees in a dream that he performs ablution and then begins to pray, this vision indicates the death of worry, worry, and trickery that is close to reality. Seeing washing in a dream generally indicates Victory over enemies. Seeing a dove in a dream indicates stealing something from the dreamer, and God knows best. Seeing washing and asking for forgiveness in a dream indicates the recovery of the sick person in the event of an illness in the vision, or it may indicate the disappearance of worries and the repayment of debt or marriage, and God knows best. Interpretation of dreams to see washing In a dream, Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation: Al-Nabulsi will interpret the vision of ablution in a dream as evidence of the fulfillment of the dreamer’s desire. If the dreamer sees that he is washing in the bathroom, then this dream is one of the hated dreams that indicate that the dreamer has committed many sins. If a person sees in a dream that he is performing ablution in the wrong way, then this It indicates the distress and pain that he is going through in reality, and God knows best. According to Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation, if a person sees in a dream that he is washing his partner’s head, this indicates an unpleasant matter represented by the emergence of a major problem for the dreamer, and God knows best. Interpretation of dreams to see washing in a dream, interpretation Ibn Shaheen: Whoever sees in a dream that he takes a bath and then sleeps, this indicates the end of the problems that the dreamer faces in reality. Seeing a bath in the bathroom means that the dreamer will soon hear good news or be saved from envy or magic, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees in a dream another person doing a bath Clothes in his house, this vision indicates that this person will get a lot of money. Interpretation of a dream about seeing ablution in a dream for a single woman. Seeing ablution in a shrine or mosque in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates her engagement or marriage soon, and God knows best. If an unmarried woman sees A married woman in her dream is that she performs ablution completely, then this vision indicates that her wish will come true in reality, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about seeing ablution in a dream for a married woman. Seeing ablution in a married woman’s dream indicates goodness and livelihood for her and her husband and symbolizes his success in his work. If a married woman sees She herself performs ablution and prays, as this vision indicates that her children will succeed in studies if she has children in reality. Among the symbols of ablution in a dream for a married woman is that it indicates goodness and achieving what she wants in reality, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about seeing ablution in a dream for a pregnant woman: seeing ablution in a dream A pregnant woman indicates that she will give birth to a healthy boy, and God knows best. A pregnant woman’s bathing while she sleeps is considered good evidence.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a woman turning into a man: seeing a girl turning into a boy in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a boy turning into a girl Interpretation of a dream about a woman having a penis Interpretation of a dream about changing the genitals Interpretation of a dream about the vagina turning into a penis Transforming a woman into a man I dreamed that my daughter became a boy One of the strange and confusing dreams that confuses the dreamer about determining its meanings, as well as the reason for the appearance of these symbols in the dreams of some despite their commitment and discipline, and this topic can also apply to men as women We are talking about the transformation, not the resemblance, because the transformation is involuntary. As for imitating the dreamer, there is a change in the appearance and appearance of the man who wears women's clothes or the length of his hair or the protrusion of his chest, and there is a transformation in the genitals that he has a trick, and there is a transformation in the simple feeling in the dream that he is not a man or people's opinion of him, although he sees that he is a man in a dream. And the transformation from a man to a woman in a dream in all its forms is not praiseworthy, not as a slander against women, but from the man's point of view, he has lost the characteristics of his masculinity, his position, and many things related to him. Power, prestige and masculinity as mentioned by Ibn Sirin and other great commentators. Seeing a man transform into a woman in a dream, as if he has a vagina like a woman, indicates submission, humiliation, contempt and the fall of his social status and may befall him with a calamity. If a woman dreams that she is a man and is associated with women and marries a woman, goodness, glory, honor and status will affect her. If he sees a woman as if she is a man and absent, he was calling him. If a pregnant woman sees that she is like a man, she may give birth to a boy. Interpretation of seeing a person transform in a dream and a woman who sees that she has a penis like men and if she has a son, she is the owner of his family. These visions are sometimes attributed to him to protect the husband or one of the woman's mahrams, as the erection of the penis if a woman sees in a dream indicates her husband's high status and high stature. Cases of a man transforming into a woman in a dream: When a man transforms into a woman in a dream by wearing formal women's clothing and adorning himself with women's jewelry or appearance, he becomes very similar to a woman. People. As for his sadness over the transformation of his external appearance into a woman, he is going through something that is difficult for him to solve and in which he loses his strength and position among people, but that will be after this difficulty ends, as it was before in his life and in his relationships with others. As for the case of a transformation in the organs, if he sees that he has a vagina instead of a penis, it is interpreted as submission and humiliation among people or people’s contempt for him by a matter or revealing something that exposes and offends. His dignity among everyone or his family or people who fear that they will discover his matter, and if his chest becomes two breasts that resemble a woman and are large, he is deprived of money or the forbidden matter and is deceived by it and thinks that it is a good door, but soon this money and bliss will harm him and those around him who benefit from this money or matter. When a man sees that he is still a man, but people see him as a woman, or feel that he has turned into a woman, but his body is still like a man and his shape or organs have not changed, it may be a passing problem that disturbs his peace at home or at work or

As for the event of a transformation in the organs, If he sees that he has a vagina instead of a penis, it is interpreted as submission and humiliation among people or by people’s disdain towards him by ordering or revealing something scandalous and. Offends. His dignity among everyone, his family, or people who are afraid that they will find out about him, and if his breasts become breasts that resemble a woman and are large, then he will be deprived of money or a forbidden matter and he will be deceived by it and think that it is a good door, but soon this money and bliss will harm him and those around him who benefit from this money. When a man sees that he is still a man, but people see him as a woman, or feel that he has transformed into a woman, but his body is still like a man and his shape or organs have not changed, then he may have a transient problem that disturbs his peace at home or at work.

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing insects in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi, and what does it mean?

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing insects in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi and what it indicates. This is because seeing insects in a dream is one of the visions that causes disgust and fear of them, so it has an immediate impact and reflection on the effects of these dreams and what do they appear? Interpretation of a dream about insects by Ibn Sirin Insects in a dream indicate worry and anxiety, many quarrels, and a lot of envy and haters. Seeing insects in a dream according to Ibn Sirin for unmarried and married girls, for pregnant women, for men, and for young men. Seeing insects in a dream is evidence that the dreamer is suffering from many problems and sorrows. As for the dreamer who saw many insects in his house, it has shown that he suffers from hatred and envy between himself and those around him. The dreamer sees that he is holding insects in his hand and does not harm them. This indicates that there are many negative people in his life, but he can control them. See also: Dream interpretation of seeing black ants in a dream according to Nablus. Interpretation of seeing insects by Ibn Shaheen. The dream of insects, as interpreted by Ibn Shaheen, symbolizes the dreamer’s exposure to many From problems and diseases during his life. As for the interpretation of a dream about insects in a dream and defeating a fortune teller, it is evidence that he will meet a strong enemy in his life. The interpretation of many insects in a dream also indicates that the dreamer will face many problems and difficulties in his life. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing Worms in a dream. The dream of killing insects in a dream is evidence However, the dreamer will defeat his enemies. The interpretation of seeing lice in a dream is evidence of good character and the extent of their religiosity. The interpretation of crawling insects in a dream is evidence of her marriage to a person who does not enjoy honor and has bad morals. The attack of insects in a dream is evidence that he is facing a powerful and corrupt enemy. As for the dream interpretation of escaping insects in a dream, it is evidence of the fulfillment of her dreams and aspirations. The interpretation of killing insects in a married woman’s dream indicates that she has gotten rid of marital problems. Cleaning the house Of insects is evidence that he will get rid of envy. title: Spitting in the face in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing spitting in the face in a dream on different occasions, if you have had such a dream before, all you have to do is read the following lines that will show you and explain to you a complete and comprehensive interpretation of seeing spitting in a dream with its meanings as derived from most dream interpretation scholars, including Ibn Sirin, Ibn Shaheen and Al-Nabulsi, so the interpretation of seeing spitting in a dream is clear so that you refer to it when you see it in a dream and know its interpretation. Seeing spitting in a dream, follow us in the encyclopedia. Interpretation of seeing spitting in a dream by Ibn Sirin: We will start interpreting this day with the interpreter Ibn Sirin to know together the interpretation of seeing spitting in a dream, which is: Ibn Sirin explained that spitting is a representation of a man’s money in a dream, so he explained to us that whoever sees in a dream that he is spitting on a person, this indicates that that person is slandering. And if the spitting is mixed with blood in a dream, then it is evidence that he earns his money in forbidden ways, and God Almighty is higher and more knowledgeable. As for whoever sees himself in a dream spitting on a wall, this indicates that the dreamer spends his money on jihad for the sake of God, or trades with his money. As for whoever spits on the ground in a dream, it indicates that he will buy land or a farm, and if he spits on a tree, this indicates that the dreamer will break his promise, and God Almighty is higher and more knowledgeable. As Ibn Sirin told us, spitting is of two types, either cold or hot: cold spitting symbolizes death and hot spitting symbolizes longevity. Interpretation of seeing spitting in a dream by Al-Nabulsi: Let us get to know Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation of the dream of spitting in a dream, especially since Al-Nabulsi interpreted spitting in a dream as a symbol of human strength and went so far as to interpret certain visions, such as: Whoever sees in his dream that his saliva has dried up, this indicates that he has become unable to do things that many do, and that he will say less than that. And whoever sees in his dream that there is a kind of foam coming out of his mouth, this is evidence that he is lying and lying. And whoever sees in a dream that he is speaking, it means that he is speaking obscene words, and if it is mixed with blood or phlegm, this indicates that his words are not appropriate and are not said, and God Almighty knows best. Better. As for the one who saw in a dream that he was spitting on a person or an animal, this indicates that he is speaking incorrect words. Interpretation of seeing spitting in a dream by Ibn Shaheen: Ibn Shaheen confirmed in many interpretations of the dream that seeing spitting in a dream means bad speech, and this is one of the interpretations of seeing spitting: And whoever dreams that he spat, this indicates that he is speaking words that he does not pronounce, and if he sees that he is spitting in a place, he will respond with his words to the people of the place and to God Almighty. He is higher and knows best. Al-Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, and Ibn Sirin agreed that whoever dreams of spitting on the ground, this vision indicates that he will buy whatever land and property he wants. And whoever sees that he spat, and his spit is yellow, this indicates that he is afflicted with a disease, and if the spit tends to be black, then there is nothing but worry and sadness that will affect the dreamer, and God Almighty. He is higher and knows best. He said: Whoever sees in his dream that his saliva is dry, this indicates that the dreamer suffers from poverty, and if his saliva is abundant, this indicates

He is higher and knows best. He said: Whoever sees in his dream that his saliva is dry, this indicates that the dreamer suffers from poverty, and if his saliva is abundant, this indicates

title: What is the interpretation of seeing fish in a dream according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: A dream about fish for a married woman: Seeing fish in a dream can indicate many different meanings depending on the condition of the person who sees it, that is, if he is poor, sick, or single, and the condition of the fish as well, if it is fresh, cooked, or rotten and smells bad, but scholars have agreed that Most visions and dreams involving fish or marine animals in general are good, so let’s learn together about the interpretation of seeing fish in a dream for a married woman, a single girl, and various other situations, in order. So follow us. Interpretation of seeing fish in a dream by Ibn SirinSeeing fish in a dream means That you will hear some happy news or advance in the ranks of knowledge, achieve goals and even find a suitable job for the person who brings you profit, especially if he is poor and sees himself eating fish, which indicates that he will get a job or learn a new art that will help him earn a lot of money. For a period of time. Interpretation of a fish in a dream: If the fish has a somewhat salty taste, it shows sobriety and wise thinking about matters before making decisions. It also remains healthy and sound if the person has suffered from some diseases in the past or suffered from a period of illness, and if the fish is eaten while it is Grilled, this indicates the enmity or animosity that brings the visionary together with some people, whether they are colleagues at work, studies, or relatives in the family environment. To get the correct interpretation, search on Google for an Egyptian dream interpretation website. Interpretation of seeing fish for a woman A married woman and a single girl. If a married woman sees a fresh fish, it could be a sign of pregnancy for the male child, and the feeling of happiness and joy is reflected in his psychological state. If she has already given birth, this indicates the stability of her life with her husband. If the fish is fried or smells bad, this indicates that some Disagreements may have arisen between her and her husband, and therefore she sees a fish in a dream in this case. Seeing raw fish in a dream for a married woman. Seeing raw fish in a dream for a married woman means that she will receive a large inheritance. Seeing a married person seeing raw fish in a dream may mean that God Almighty He will bless her with pregnancy soon. If a married dreamer sees a fish in water in a dream, this is a sign that he will receive many blessings and good deeds. A pregnant woman who sees a raw fish in a dream means that God Almighty will grant her and her future fetus good health and a body free of diseases. If A pregnant woman sees a raw fish in a dream, it means how close she is to Almighty God and that she will give birth to a son. Seeing fishing in a dream for a married woman Seeing fishing in a dream for a married woman indicates that she will open a new project of her own and will be able to achieve many achievements and victories in her career. Seeing a married woman catching a fish in a dream means that the Great Creator will bless her with pregnancy soon. If a married woman sees herself fishing with her hand in a dream, this is one of her good dreams.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a man turning into a woman: seeing a young man turning into a girl in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a woman turning into a man Interpretation of a dream about a male turning into a female Interpretation of a dream about a boy turning into a girl Interpretation of a dream about a human being turning into an animal Interpretation of a dream about a person turning into a cat Turning a woman into a child in a dream Interpretation of a dream about changing genital organs Interpretation of a dream about a woman with a penis Among the strange and confusing dreams that the dreamer is confused about to determine their meanings, As well as the reason why these symbols appear in the dreams of some people despite their commitment and discipline, and this topic can apply to men and women. External appearance: When a man wears women's clothes, or his hair is long, or his chest protrudes, and a transformation occurs in the genital organs, he becomes a vagina, and a transformation occurs in the simple feeling in the dream that he is not a man and people do not look at him like this even though he sees that he is a man in his dream. The transformation from a man is To a woman in a dream in all its forms is not worthy of praise, not in terms of slandering women, but in terms of losing the characteristics of masculinity, the status of a man, and many issues related to power. And prestige and masculinity, as mentioned by Ibn Sirin and other major commentators. Cases of a man turning into a woman in a dream When a man turns into a woman in a dream by wearing formal women’s clothes and decorating himself with a woman’s adornment or appearance, he becomes very similar to a woman. People. As for his sadness over the transformation of his outward appearance into a woman, he is going through something that is difficult for him to solve and in which he loses his strength and status among people, but that will be after this difficulty ends, as it was before in his life and his relationships with others. As for the transformation of the organs, if If he sees that he has a vagina instead of a penis, it is interpreted as submission and humiliation among people, or by the world’s contempt towards him in the matter, or by revealing something that is scandalous and insulting. His dignity among all members of his family or among people is afraid that they will find out about him, and if his chest becomes woman-like and large breasts, then he will obtain forbidden money or a forbidden matter and will be deceived. With this, he believes that it is a good door, but soon this money and bliss will harm him and those around him who benefit from this money or matter. When a man sees that he is still a man, but people see him as a woman, or they feel that he has turned into a woman, but his appearance is still like A man, and neither his appearance nor his organs have changed, this means that it may be a passing problem that disturbs his safety at home, at work, or in his family, and the topic may indicate that in an obscene person his deception and cunning are revealed, trying to ensnare God with his machinations, and life will return to how it was after his death Interpretation of a dream about becoming six men - YouTube.
